nodes.bodyText: Will we ever need to know if the "domain" key will need to be used anywhere else? Should we make it a constant?

For metrics configuration we just hardcode the values (ie. https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/blob/master/core/common/src/main/java/alluxio/metrics/MetricsSystem.java#L166). This one seems 1 time use, aside from maybe testing?
I am ok leaving it for now. Maybe in the future we can just integrate metrics configuration with alluxio-site.properties....
